summary: A Navy veteran purchases a government surplus vessel and becomes involved in the capture of waterfront racketeers.
cast: Arthur Franz|Beverly Garland|Helene Stanton|Michael Ansara|Stacy Harris|William Henry|Michael Granger|Frank Ray Perilli|Ed Nelson|Mike Mazurki|Al Chittenden|Joseph L. Scheuering|Victor Schiro|Howard L. Dey|Pete Herman|Ralph Dupas|Walter B. Hamlin|Allen J. Ellender Sr.|William Woodson
title: New Orleans Uncensored
